overview: Join world-famous adult superstars Ashlyn Gere and Victoria Paris in a bold new erotic feature directed by Michael Ninn. Lounging at a lavish mansion, Paris and Gere plumb the depths of their x-rated imaginations to spin tales of erotic fantasy--each one coming to life in blazing glory. From a backdoor tryst between Jeanna Fine and the chauffeur, to a latex wet dream, to an elegant three-way, each story tops the other, including a poolside encounter between Ashlyn, Victoria and the hunky poolboy. Three other hot scenes show just how nasty these girls can be when they put their minds to it, whether it is an orgy, a three-girl grope, or a session with the maid and the chauffeur. Decadence is one title that definitely lives up to its name!
title: Decadence
